import*as Blockly from'blockly/core';// Create a custom block for performing binary operations.
var binaryOp={'type':'binaryOp','message0':'%1 %2 %3','args0':[{'type':'input_value','name':'A','check':'Number'},{'type':'field_dropdown','name':'OPERATOR','options':[['+','+'],['-','-'],['*','*'],['/','/'],['%','%'],['>','>'],['<','<']]},{'type':'input_value','name':'B','check':'Number'}],'inputsInline':true,'output':'Number',//blockly math color
'colour':230,'tooltip':'','helpUrl':''};// Create the block definitions for the JSON-only blocks.
export var binaryOpBlock=Blockly.common.createBlockDefinitionsFromJsonArray([binaryOp]);
